name: Heroic Patrol 1.0
description:
Heroic Patrol is a shooter game in which you must survive 15 hordes of enemies thirsty for your blood!
Their goal is one, expel you from their dungeon! but your orders are explicit,
do not abandon your position under any circumstances!
Now it's a fight!

  •    five unique weapons with each having its role within the game.
  •    Drag Drop mode to drag destructible objects and form barricades!
  •    Boss fights every 3 hordes!
  •    A store that sells Upgrades for your character and weapons!
  •    Unique enemies, with each having their role in how to KILL you!
